roadmap.title: Learn Programming Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Start with a language like Python or JavaScript. Focus on variables, loops, functions, and object-oriented programming.

roadmap.title: Build Small Projects
roadmap.description: Create projects like a calculator, to-do list app, or simple website to apply your skills.

roadmap.title: Learn Data Structures and Algorithms
roadmap.description: Understand arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, and basic algorithms (sorting, searching). Practice on platforms like LeetCode.

roadmap.title: Explore a Specialization
roadmap.description: Choose a focus area (e.g., web development, mobile apps, backend). Learn frameworks like React (for web) or Spring (for backend).

roadmap.title: Build a Portfolio and Apply for Jobs
roadmap.description: Create a portfolio website showcasing your projects. Apply for entry-level software engineering roles or internships.

roadmap.title: Learn Design Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Understand color theory, typography, and layout principles. Study basic design concepts.
resources: Book: 'The Non-Designerâ€™s Design Book' by Robin Williams

roadmap.title: Master Design Software
roadmap.description: Learn tools like Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, or Figma for creating digital designs.

roadmap.title: Create Sample Designs
roadmap.description: Design logos, posters, or social media graphics to build your skills.

roadmap.title: Build a Portfolio
roadmap.description: Compile your best work into a portfolio on Behance or a personal website.

roadmap.title: Freelance or Apply for Jobs
roadmap.description: Start freelancing on platforms like Upwork or apply for junior graphic designer positions.

roadmap.title: Learn Python and Statistics
roadmap.description: Master Python (NumPy, Pandas) and basic statistics (mean, median, probability).

roadmap.title: Understand Machine Learning Basics
roadmap.description: Learn about regression, classification, and clustering using scikit-learn.
resources: Coursera Machine Learning by Andrew Ng (https://www.coursera.org)

roadmap.title: Work on Data Projects
roadmap.description: Analyze datasets (e.g., Titanic dataset) and build predictive models.

roadmap.title: Learn Big Data Tools
roadmap.description: Explore tools like SQL, Spark, or Tableau for handling large datasets.

roadmap.title: Build a Portfolio and Apply
roadmap.description: Showcase your projects on GitHub and apply for data scientist roles.

roadmap.title: Learn Software Testing Basics
roadmap.description: Understand types of testing (manual, automated, unit, integration).

roadmap.title: Master Testing Tools
roadmap.description: Learn tools like Selenium, JUnit, or Postman for automated and API testing.

roadmap.title: Practice Writing Test Cases
roadmap.description: Create test cases for sample applications (e.g., a login page).

roadmap.title: Get Certified
roadmap.description: Obtain a certification like ISTQB Foundation Level to boost credibility.

roadmap.title: Apply for QA Roles
roadmap.description: Build a resume highlighting your testing skills and apply for QA jobs.
